properties.name: nats.spring.connection-name
properties.description: Connection name, shows up in thread names.

properties.name: nats.spring.connection-timeout
properties.description: Timeout for the initial connection, if this time is passed, the connection will fail and no reconnect attempts are made.

properties.name: nats.spring.credentials
properties.description: User credentials file path, do not use with user/password, or token, or NKey. Credentials are used by account enabled servers.

properties.name: nats.spring.inbox-prefix
properties.description: Prefix to use for inboxes, generally the default is used but custom prefixes can allow security controls.

properties.name: nats.spring.key-store-password
properties.description: Password for the SSL keystore.

properties.name: nats.spring.key-store-path
properties.description: Path to the SSL keystore.

properties.name: nats.spring.key-store-provider
properties.description: Provider Algorithm for the the SSL key store, for verifying the server.

properties.name: nats.spring.key-store-type
properties.description: Type of SSL keystore, generally the default is used.

properties.name: nats.spring.max-reconnect
properties.description: Maximum reconnect attempts if a connection is lost, after the initial connection.

properties.name: nats.spring.nkey
properties.description: Private key (seed) for NKey authentication, do not use with user/password, or token, or credentials.

properties.name: nats.spring.no-echo
properties.description: Whether or not the server will send messages sent from this connection back to the connection.

properties.name: nats.spring.password
properties.description: Authentication password. Requires the username, but not the token, or credentials, or NKey.

properties.name: nats.spring.ping-interval
properties.description: Time between pings to the server to check "liveness".

properties.name: nats.spring.reconnect-buffer-size
properties.description: Size of the buffer, in bytes, used to hold outgoing messages during reconnect.

properties.name: nats.spring.reconnect-wait
properties.description: Time to wait between reconnect attempts to the same server url.

properties.name: nats.spring.server
properties.description: URL for the nats server, can be a comma separated list.

properties.name: nats.spring.tls-protocol
properties.description: TLS Protocol version for the SSL Context Values: TLSv1.2, TLSv1.3

properties.name: nats.spring.token
properties.description: Authentication token, do not use with username/password, or credentials, or NKey.

properties.name: nats.spring.trust-store-password
properties.description: Password for the SSL trust store used to verify the server.

properties.name: nats.spring.trust-store-path
properties.description: Path the the SSL trust store, for verifying the server.

properties.name: nats.spring.trust-store-provider
properties.description: Provider Algorithm for the SSL trust store used to verify the server.

properties.name: nats.spring.trust-store-type
properties.description: Type of SSL trust store, generally the default is used.

properties.name: nats.spring.username
properties.description: Authentication user name. Requires the password, but not the token, or credentials, or NKey.

properties.name: nats.spring.utf8-support
properties.description: Whether or not to treat subjects as UTF-8, the default is ASCII.
